A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie introduced a number of new characters at the expense of of ones we'd just started caring about.  It gleefully assaulted everything anyone loved about the movies that came before\, and it presented us with plots that (a) had enormous holes in them (b)were a total aside to the main story\, and (c) served to push character or moral agendas rather than tell a story.

The movie features the gorgeous effects you expect from Star Wars\, and has competent battle scenes and occasional funny moments.

Long story short\, if you're going to rewrite Star Wars\, you're going to have to do it well.  I feel like in an effort to shed the past\, we're left with a far lesser successor.
